sqlMap.insert: /* SMS NAS USEDISK 수입데이터 입력 */ INSERT INTO IOC_SDTIC_BUC_USEDISK_SMS ( USEDISK_SEQ, OBJ_NAME, RSCTYPE_ID, RSC_KEY_NAME, USE_DISK_VALUE, COLLECT_DATE, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( USEDISK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #obj_name#, #rsctype_id#, #rsc_key_name#, #resultvalue_double#, #collect_date#, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDhh24mmss') )
